articles.author: MITSURU OBE
articles.title: BOJ drops explicit 1% ceiling for 10-year JGB yields - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Central bank raises inflation projections but not as much as market expected
articles.content:
TOKYO -- The Bank of Japan on Tuesday tweaked its ultra-easy monetary policy, discarding any explicit ceiling for 10-year Japanese government bond yields.
Responding to rising prices and the yen's c… [+232 chars]
